name: qti-labels-none
desc: No labels displayed.

name: qti-labels-decimal
desc: Display numeric characters 1, 2, 3, …

name: qti-labels-lower-alpha
desc: Display lowercase characters a, b, c, …

name: qti-labels-upper-alpha
desc: Display uppercase characters A, B, C, …

name: qti-labels-suffix-none
desc: No character is displayed after the choice label.

name: qti-labels-suffix-period
desc: A period “.” character is displayed after the choice label.

name: qti-labels-suffix-parenthesis
desc: A right parenthesis “)” character is displayed after the choice label.

name: qti-orientation-vertical
desc: Choices are displayed from top to bottom, vertically.

name: qti-orientation-horizontal
desc: Choices are displayed from left to right, horizontally.

name: qti-choices-stacking-1
desc: Choices are stacked in 1 column.

name: qti-choices-stacking-2
desc: Choices are stacked in 2 columns.

name: qti-choices-stacking-3
desc: Choices are stacked in 3 columns.

name: qti-choices-stacking-4
desc: Choices are stacked in 4 columns.

name: qti-choices-stacking-5
desc: Choices are stacked in 5 columns.

name: qti-input-control-hidden
desc: Hide the input controls of the choices.

name: qti-input-width-1
desc: Input element width at least 1 character.

name: qti-input-width-2
desc: Input element width at least 2 characters.

name: qti-input-width-3
desc: Input element width at least 3 characters.

name: qti-input-width-4
desc: Input element width at least 4 characters.

name: qti-input-width-6
desc: Input element width at least 6 characters.

name: qti-input-width-10
desc: Input element width at least 10 characters.

name: qti-input-width-15
desc: Input element width at least 15 characters.

name: qti-input-width-20
desc: Input element width at least 20 characters.

name: qti-input-width-72
desc: Input element width at least 72 characters. (Intended to be interpreted as the full width of a tablet.)

name: qti-height-lines-3
desc: Input area is approximately 3 lines tall.

name: qti-height-lines-6
desc: Input area is approximately 6 lines tall.

name: qti-height-lines-15
desc: Input area is approximately 15 lines tall.

name: qti-counter-down
desc: Display a character counter, starting at the value of the expected-length attribute and counting down to 0.

name: qti-counter-up
desc: Display a character counter, starting at 0 and increasing to the value of the expected-length attribute.

name: qti-choices-top
desc: The gap choices container is displayed above the passage text.

name: qti-choices-bottom
desc: The gap choices container is displayed below the passage text.

name: qti-choices-left
desc: The gap choices container is displayed to the left of the passage text.

name: qti-choices-right
desc: The gap choices container is displayed to the right of the passage text.

name: qti-selections-light
desc: Delivery platform must implement hotspot selections in a color that the platform believes to be of suitable color contrast and opacity against a “dark” background image.

name: qti-selections-dark
desc: Delivery platform must implement hotspot selections in a color that the platform believes to be of suitable color contrast and opacity against a “light” background image.

name: qti-unselected-hidden
desc: Hotspot selections are visually hidden until focused or selected.

name: qti-match-tabular
desc: Render a visual table with the choices of the first Simple Match Set as the table row headers, and the choices of the second Simple Match Set as the table column headers.

name: qti-header-hidden
desc: For certain presentations, it can be advantageous to hide the column headers.  This class enables this presentation.  Do not display the top row of the table where the column headers are displayed.

name: qti-underline
desc: Underline an element.

name: qti-italic
desc: Italicize an element.

name: qti-align-left
desc: Horizontal alignment left.

name: qti-align-center
desc: Horizontal alignment center.

name: qti-align-right
desc: Horizontal alignment right.

name: qti-valign-top
desc: Vertical alignment top.

name: qti-valign-middle
desc: Vertical alignment middle.

name: qti-valign-baseline
desc: Vertical alignment baseline.

name: qti-valign-bottom
desc: Vertical alignment bottom.

name: qti-fullwidth
desc: Set the width of the element to 100% of the width of the element’s container.

name: qti-hidden
desc: A completely hidden element is neither visually-perceptible nor “visible” to assistive technology.

name: qti-visually-hidden
desc: A visually hidden element is not visually perceptible.  However, it is “visible” to assistive technology.

name: qti-bordered
desc: Adds a visual border to an element.

name: qti-well
desc: Adds a “well” to an element.  A “well” is a UI convention of adding visual importance to an element.  Increased visual importance is usually achieved by adding both a border and background + foreground colors to the element.  The background color should be chosen by the delivery platform so as not violate WCAG AA guidelines for foreground color textual contrast.

name: qti-layout-row
desc: Adds a “well” to an element.  A “well” is a UI convention of adding visual importance to an element.  Increased visual importance is usually achieved by adding both a border and background + foreground colors to the element.  The background color should be chosen by the delivery platform so as not violate WCAG AA guidelines for foreground color textual contrast.
